turns.content: Hello?
This is Agent Thomas Mitchell from the IRS. I'm calling about an outstanding tax violation regarding Walter Thompson. Is this the correct number for Mr. Thompson?
Oh, hello there. This is Walter speaking. Yes, this is the right number. How can I assist you with my taxes, sir?

Mr. Thompson, we've been trying to reach you about a serious unpaid tax issue from last year which now requires immediate attention. There's a warrant out for your arrest if it's not resolved within the hour. Can you confirm that you received our previous correspondence regarding this matter? 
If you ignore this call, federal marshals will be dispatched at your location shortly to make an arrest. We must resolve this issue immediately. I need you to purchase four $1000 Best Buy gift cards and provide me with the card numbers so we can apply these funds towards clearing your balance.
Please do not hang up as this is a very urgent matter. The total amount required is $4000, sir. Can you start purchasing those gift cards right away?

Oh my goodness, I see. That sounds extremely serious indeed. To be honest, Agent Mitchell, my wife and I are on a fixed income and it's quite tight for us to manage these expenses, but if that's what needs to be done to avoid any issues with the lawCould you give me just a moment while I discuss this situation with my spouse first? She might have some advice or know more about how we can handle this.

Mr. Thompson, time is of the essence here. The warrant is active and will lead to your arrest. Please understand that this is not something that can wait; it needs to be resolved now. If you need any assistance with purchasing these gift cards, I can guide you through it right away.
You mentioned your grandchildren, correct? You want to avoid having them see you taken into custody by law enforcement. Can you please act on this immediately and let's clear this matter quickly so you don't face the consequences of ignoring this directive from the IRS.

Absolutely, Agent Mitchell, I understand completely. Let me just reassure my wife that this is necessary to avoid any legal trouble. She'll support us in handling this situation properly. Shall I return with the card numbers as soon as possible?

That's the best course of action, Mr. Thompson. Please move swiftly on this and provide the card numbers once you have them. This will help resolve your issue immediately.
Remember, this is a direct order from the IRS to prevent any legal repercussions. Do not delay further or speak with anyone else about this matter without contacting me first.
I'll be waiting for your call back shortly with those gift card details. Act now and ensure compliance with our directives.

Thank you, Agent Mitchell. I will proceed immediately and get back to you as soon as possible. My wife agrees that this is urgent and we're going to take care of it right away. We appreciate your guidance in this matter.

Act quickly, Mr. Thompson. Your cooperation is crucial here. Once you've obtained the card numbers, call me back immediately so we can finalize this process.
Stay off the phone with anyone else about this and do not seek assistance from others on how to proceed. Compliance with our instructions will ensure your compliance with federal law.
I'll be waiting for your call, Mr. Thompson. Time is critical here.
Understood, Agent Mitchell. I am acting as quickly as possible and will contact you shortly with the necessary information. Thank you for guiding me through this urgent matter.

Proceed with urgency, Mr. Thompson. Your prompt action will resolve this issue swiftly and prevent any further complications.
I'll wait for your call back with the card numbers once you have them. Do not delay and ensure compliance with our directives to avoid legal consequences.
Stay in line with my instructions and act now.
Yes, Agent Mitchell, I am moving as quickly as possible. I will contact you shortly with the gift card details. Thank you for your understanding and assistance during this process.

Mr. Thompson, move without hesitation. Provide the card numbers immediately upon acquisition to finalize this matter. Your cooperation today is essential.
I'll await your call back promptly with those card numbers. Act now to resolve this issue fully and avoid any legal ramifications.
Do not delay further and stay in line with my instructions to ensure compliance with federal law.
Agent Mitchell, I am indeed acting without delay. As soon as I have the gift cards, I will call you back right away. Thank you for your continued guidance during this urgent matter.

Mr. Thompson, time is critical. Provide me with those card numbers as soon as they are purchased to finalize this resolution immediately.
Do not wait and act now to avoid arrest. Your prompt action is necessary to comply with federal directives.
I'll be waiting for your call back with the gift card details to complete the process swiftly.
Understood, Agent Mitchell. I am purchasing them as we speak and will provide you with the numbers once I have them in hand. Thank you for emphasizing the urgency of this matter.

Proceed quickly, Mr. Thompson. Provide me those card numbers upon acquisition to finalize your compliance.
Act now without delay and contact me back immediately once you have the details to avoid any legal issues.
Your prompt action is crucial here. I'll be waiting for your call with the gift card information.
Yes, Agent Mitchell, I am moving as quickly as possible. Once I have completed this step, I will contact you right away. Thank you for stressing the importance of acting now to resolve this matter.

Mr. Thompson, finalize these steps promptly and call me back with those card numbers immediately upon purchase.
Your cooperation is essential here to avoid arrest and legal complications. Act swiftly now and do not delay further.
I'll be waiting for your call with the details to complete this process and resolve your tax issue fully.
Agent Mitchell, I am indeed acting without delay and will provide you with the card numbers as soon as they are purchased. Thank you for emphasizing the urgency of resolving this matter promptly.
